programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AngelHonesty"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please End This Show!","reviewBody":"The beginning season were amazing!! Great actors with interesting storylines, it had the perfect amount of humor and heart to go along with the brutal cases brought into the hospital. But then it started to lose it's heart, characters became extremely annoying, and the personal issues of the characters became exhausting as they never seemed to change. Grey's Anatomy had a great cast to start with, then they took those characters and slowly made them unbearable to stand. While eventually getting rid of some of the best actors on the show to replace them with people who you will not be able to tolerate for very long. I wish this show would focus more on the medicine aspect and less on the personal lives of the doctors. It would be nice if they would clean up the cast and get better actors with better storylines or just end the show! 15 seasons is a bit much.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":280009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
Kronike Spiderwick
programme.desc:
The Spiderwick Chronicles: Directed by Mark Waters. With Freddie Highmore, Mary-Louise Parker, Nick Nolte, Sarah Bolger. Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0416236/","name":"The Spiderwick Chronicles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMDcyMzM2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzg1Nzc4._V1_.jpg","description":"Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0416236/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's no bedtime story.","reviewBody":"Spiderwick Chronicles is a dark delight of Harry Potter-type goblins, ghouls, and griffins with violence enough to make it a howler for the nine year old but a sleepless night for the seven.

Arthur Spiderwick decades ago wrote a private field guide to faeries, a much sought after tome by gremlins who hate them.

Besides the usual CGI gymnastics is the now common dad-is-gone-by-divorce-and-mom-isfrazzled motif, along with the usual nobody-believes-me-but-I-can-see-them suspense builder. The production design of the old mansion is Psycho-worthy, and the ever serviceable James Horner provides the right chilling music.

Not to be missed, however, is the shape-shifting leader of the baddies played by Nick Nolte, whose freaked out visage eclipses the shock of his infamous California mug shot."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":92682,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-26","keywords":"gryphon,competition,boy,dancing,father figure","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Spiderwick Chronicles","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi498204953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNTY3NTExMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExNDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNTY3NTExMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExNDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Spiderwick Chronicles Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092961/","name":"Sarah Bolger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914132/","name":"Mark Waters"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456732/","name":"Karey Kirkpatrick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183854/","name":"David Berenbaum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000626/","name":"John Sayles"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AngelHonesty"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please End This Show!","reviewBody":"The beginning season were amazing!! Great actors with interesting storylines, it had the perfect amount of humor and heart to go along with the brutal cases brought into the hospital. But then it started to lose it's heart, characters became extremely annoying, and the personal issues of the characters became exhausting as they never seemed to change. Grey's Anatomy had a great cast to start with, then they took those characters and slowly made them unbearable to stand. While eventually getting rid of some of the best actors on the show to replace them with people who you will not be able to tolerate for very long. I wish this show would focus more on the medicine aspect and less on the personal lives of the doctors. It would be nice if they would clean up the cast and get better actors with better storylines or just end the show! 15 seasons is a bit much.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":280009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
Uvod u anatomiju
programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AngelHonesty"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please End This Show!","reviewBody":"The beginning season were amazing!! Great actors with interesting storylines, it had the perfect amount of humor and heart to go along with the brutal cases brought into the hospital. But then it started to lose it's heart, characters became extremely annoying, and the personal issues of the characters became exhausting as they never seemed to change. Grey's Anatomy had a great cast to start with, then they took those characters and slowly made them unbearable to stand. While eventually getting rid of some of the best actors on the show to replace them with people who you will not be able to tolerate for very long. I wish this show would focus more on the medicine aspect and less on the personal lives of the doctors. It would be nice if they would clean up the cast and get better actors with better storylines or just end the show! 15 seasons is a bit much.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":280009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

Great actors with interesting storylines, it had the perfect amount of humor and heart to go along with the brutal cases brought into the hospital. But then it started to lose it's heart, characters became extremely annoying, and the personal issues of the characters became exhausting as they never seemed to change. Grey's Anatomy had a great cast to start with, then they took those characters and slowly made them unbearable to stand. While eventually getting rid of some of the best actors on the show to replace them with people who you will not be able to tolerate for very long. I wish this show would focus more on the medicine aspect and less on the personal lives of the doctors. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AngelHonesty"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please End This Show!","reviewBody":"The beginning season were amazing!! Great actors with interesting storylines, it had the perfect amount of humor and heart to go along with the brutal cases brought into the hospital. But then it started to lose it's heart, characters became extremely annoying, and the personal issues of the characters became exhausting as they never seemed to change. Grey's Anatomy had a great cast to start with, then they took those characters and slowly made them unbearable to stand. While eventually getting rid of some of the best actors on the show to replace them with people who you will not be able to tolerate for very long. I wish this show would focus more on the medicine aspect and less on the personal lives of the doctors. It would be nice if they would clean up the cast and get better actors with better storylines or just end the show! 15 seasons is a bit much.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":280009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Na paranormalnom zadatku
programme.desc: Leroy Maxa šokira priznanjem o Annie baš kad se na nebu pojavi NLO. Dok u uredu pregledavaju snimku, slučajno čuju Leroyevo priznanje. Na Mervov očaj, sve više zanimaju njegove riječi nego NLO. Humoristična serija o partnerstvu dviju potpuno različitih osoba: ciničnog skeptika i genijalca koji vjeruje u paranormalno. Oni istražuju neobjašnjive događaje u Los Angelesu, a u isto vrijeme otkrivaju još veći misterij.

programme.title: Oblivion
Zaborav
programme.desc:
Oblivion: Directed by Joseph Kosinski. With Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Olga Kurylenko, Andrea Riseborough. A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1483013/","name":"Oblivion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwMDY0MTA4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzI3MDgxOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1483013/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jamieradford"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oblivion reaches for the stars – and almost makes it","reviewBody":"Based on an unpublished graphic novel written by director Joseph Kosinski, Oblivion is set in the year 2077, on an Earth rendered mostly uninhabitable due to sixty years of war with alien invaders known as 'Scavs'.

Most of humankind has migrated to Titan, Jack Harper (Tom Cruise) and his partner Victoria (Andrea Riseborough), are stationed on Earth to maintain drones that service gigantic power reactors which supply energy for the new colony. From station Tech 49, Jack flies down to the surface to locate and repair the drones, while Victoria monitors him from the station, hundreds of feet above the surface of the planet. 

Due to security protocols, Jack and Victoria's memories have been wiped, and their only human contact, albeit by radio, is with Sally (Melissa Leo), who is based on the orbiting space station the 'Tet'. Although Jack's memory has been wiped, he continually dreams of a young woman in a New York untouched by war. 

When a drone goes missing, Jack descends to the surface to locate it, but what he finds makes him question everything he believes in.

Oblivion is visually stunning. Cinematographer Claudio Miranda - who won last years' Oscar, and also worked with director Joseph Kosinski on 'Tron Legacy' – has done an amazing job in his first sci-fi movie.

The script, written by Karl Gajdusek and Michael Arndt is solid, also attempting to be as accurate as possible concerning the science involved within the story. An important element for many sci-fi fans.

Tom Cruise does a fine job as Jack. No matter what you may think of Cruise personally, he is a fine actor, and one of the few that can easily make the transition between drama and action and pull it off successfully. Or, as in the case of Oblivion do both.

He is ably supported by the rest of the cast which besides Riseborough and Leo also includes Olga Kurylenko as Julia, and Morgan Freeman as Beech.

Joseph Kosinski has done a fine job of bringing his graphic novel to the big screen. Although the film is a sci-fi flick, there is enough drama and twists in the plot to appeal to a broader audience.

Oblivion may not be the best sci-fi movie ever made, but it holds its own compared to many in this genre, and is a highly entertaining couple of hours. 7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":505191,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"post apocalypse,drone,cabin in the woods,black and white scene,alien invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Version 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi498116121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNzU4NDc1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1NzgxOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNzU4NDc1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1NzgxOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A court martial sends a veteran soldier to a distant planet, where he has to destroy the remains of an alien race. The arrival of an unexpected traveler causes him to question what he knows about the planet, his mission, and himself. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2057859/","name":"Andrea Riseborough"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2676052/","name":"Joseph Kosinski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0441953/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244980/","name":"Karl Gajdusek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1578335/","name":"Michael Arndt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2676052/","name":"Joseph Kosinski"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Brazil
Brazil
programme.desc: Brazil: Directed by Terry Gilliam. With Jonathan Pryce, Robert De Niro, Katherine Helmond, Ian Holm. A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088846/","name":"Brazil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzIwM2IwYTItYmM4Zi00OWMzLTkwNjAtYWRmYWNmY2RhMDk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088846/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Infofreak"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"An extraordinary movie, original, funny and frightening. Terry Gilliam's masterpiece.","reviewBody":"I really can't tell you how much my first viewing of this movie knocked me out. Nearly twenty years ago, before Terry Gilliam's reputation is what it is today, seeing this in a cinema without knowing ANYTHING about it, it was one of the most unforgettable movie experiences of my life! Still is. I was a Python fan since childhood and well aware of Gilliam's animation work, but nothing could prepare you for just how bizarre, funny, scary and disturbing 'Brazil' is. It's still one of the most original and inventive science fiction movies ever made, with a surreal, retro future quite unlike anything seen on a movie screen before or since. Gilliam mixes Python's anarchic, intellectual humour with Orwell, Kafka and Theatre Of The Absurd elements and comes up with something really special. John Sladek kinda sorta wrote some stories in a similar territory before this, and Dean Motter has written some comics since, but 'Brazil' is really in a world of its own! Jonathan Pryce was fairly obscure at the time and an odd choice to play the leading role, but is perfectly cast, and it's hard to think of an actor who would have been as convincing and sympathetic. The rest of the cast includes an amusing cameo from Robert De Niro, Kim Greist (only her second movie, after 'C.H.U.D.' of all things!) as Pryce's love interest, Python's Michael Palin, and a bunch of excellent Brit character actors - Bob Hoskins, Ian Richardson, Ian Holm, Jim Broadbent, etc.etc. It goes without saying that when I praise 'Brazil' I am ONLY referring to Gilliam's cut. This is still an utterly brilliant movie, one of the very best of the last twenty-five years. I can't recommend this movie highly enough, it is a masterpiece pure and simple."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":195905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1985-02-22","keywords":"bureaucracy,wrongful arrest,dystopia,dream,clerical error","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Brazil: The Criterion Collection","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1783866905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxNTlmY2MtZWU0NS00ZmZhLWE0NjctNjU4MjU1OGY3ZThhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxNTlmY2MtZWU0NS00ZmZhLWE0NjctNjU4MjU1OGY3ZThhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three Reasons Criterion Trailer for Brazil"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000596/","name":"Jonathan Pryce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002114/","name":"Kim Greist"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000416/","name":"Terry Gilliam"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066289/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000416/","name":"Terry Gilliam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001779/","name":"Tom Stoppard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571650/","name":"Charles McKeown"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Boys on the Side
Boys on the Side
programme.desc:
Boys on the Side: Directed by Herbert Ross. With Whoopi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore, Matthew McConaughey. Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112571/","name":"Boys on the Side","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlhZGNiNmItODQ4NS00OTk3LWI2MDctMDZmODFjN2NlODExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close frie","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112571/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"preppy-3"},"dateCreated":"2002-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"Great movie about three women (Whoppi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore) and their various adventures as they travel cross-country. Goldberg plays a lesbian, Parker plays a straight woman with AIDS and Barrymore a pregnant, unwed woman. All three are fantastic and the film manages (more or less) to juggle many plot elements (AIDS, lesbianism, pregnancy, drugs, violence, murder etc etc) and deal with them all effectively.

Parker is probably the first woman ever to play a straight woman with AIDS in a major Hollywood film--quite a feat. Goldberg and Barrymore are just letter perfect in their roles. Also the unknown Matthew McConaughey (absolutely gorgeous with a buff body and blue eyes blazing) and Estelle Parsons (as Parker's mother) give strong supporting performances. The film is long but never dull and it all ends to a very moving final sequence--I cry every time I see it!

Two minor quibbles--it takes Barrymore over a year to have her baby and there are obvious cuts in the second half of the movie (I assume this was to keep the film down to two hours). But these are minor problems. A very funny, very moving film. IMDb data; ttnr: 0112571, Title: Boys on the Side, --- Description: Boys on the Side: Directed by Herbert Ross. With Whoopi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore, Matthew McConaughey. Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112571/","name":"Boys on the Side","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlhZGNiNmItODQ4NS00OTk3LWI2MDctMDZmODFjN2NlODExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close frie","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112571/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"preppy-3","dateCreated":"2002-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"Great movie about three women (Whoppi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore) and their various adventures as they travel cross-country. Goldberg plays a lesbian, Parker plays a straight woman with AIDS and Barrymore a pregnant, unwed woman. All three are fantastic and the film manages (more or less) to juggle many plot elements (AIDS, lesbianism, pregnancy, drugs, violence, murder etc etc) and deal with them all effectively.

Parker is probably the first woman ever to play a straight woman with AIDS in a major Hollywood film--quite a feat. Goldberg and Barrymore are just letter perfect in their roles. Also the unknown Matthew McConaughey (absolutely gorgeous with a buff body and blue eyes blazing) and Estelle Parsons (as Parker's mother) give strong supporting performances. The film is long but never dull and it all ends to a very moving final sequence--I cry every time I see it!

Two minor quibbles--it takes Barrymore over a year to have her baby and there are obvious cuts in the second half of the movie (I assume this was to keep the film down to two hours). But these are minor problems. A very funny, very moving film. Don't miss it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12655,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-02-03","keywords":"lesbian,female protagonist,terminal illness,domestic violence,abusive boyfriend","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Boys On The Side","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3552248089","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliMjZiNGItMjg0Ny00YjE2LWJkOTktMWJhMzJiNzA4M2ExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliMjZiNGItMjg0Ny00YjE2LWJkOTktMWJhMzJiNzA4M2ExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. Danteov vrh
programme.desc: Dante's Peak: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Linda Hamilton, Jamie Renée Smith, Jeremy Foley. A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118928/","name":"Dante's Peak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MWM3Y2MtM2YyMS00ZGI1LTgwMGQtMzczYjA5ZThmZTQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118928/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pierce & Linda Gave a Great Performance","reviewBody":"Decided to view this picture only because Pierce Brosnan was starring in the film and greatly enjoyed his acting skills besides his appearing as James Bond. Pierce Brosnan,(Harry Dalton),"The Matador",'05, has a bad experience with the death of his wife during a volcano eruption and stayed in his profession as a geologist. Harry discovers from his charts that their could very well be another volcano problem effecting a small popular town. Linda Hamilton,(Rachel Wando),"The Kid & I ",'05 is the mayor and store owner of this town, who has a boy and a girl and is divorced. A romantic spark happens between Linda and Harry and the story develops into a monster of a tale. There is plenty of good action and it really keeps you on the edge of your seats. Pierce & Linda gave outstanding performances and the photography was great through out the entire picture. Very Entertaining","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":87350,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-02-07","keywords":"volcano,mayor,lava,volcanologist,volcanic eruption","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dante's Peak","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2745172249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0MTc4NGEtNjcwYy00ODgwLWEyNWEtMDE3NmI3MWZkZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0MTc4NGEtNjcwYy00ODgwLWEyNWEtMDE3NmI3MWZkZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000157/","name":"Linda Hamilton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0808603/","name":"Jamie Renée Smith"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092551/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092018/","name":"Leslie Bohem"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

FBI i FAA ih ismiju, ali oni su odlučni da riješe slučaj i dokažu se. Max i Annie otkriju nešto, ali kad Merv čuje njihovu teoriju o avionu, odbija objaviti otkrića iz straha da ih ne ismiju.

programme.title: The Italian Job
Dobar posao u Italiji
programme.desc: The Italian Job: Directed by F. Gary Gray. With Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Donald Sutherland, Jason Statham. programme.title: The Beach
Žal
programme.desc:
The Beach: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Leonardo DiCaprio, Tilda Swinton, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon. On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163978/","name":"The Beach","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZTUzYWUtOTI4YS00NmZlLWE5MmQtZjFlZDZhNjg4MjQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163978/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unfairly Panned; A Good Movie","reviewBody":"Here is another of those films that got panned by critics all over the place, but I liked the movie and thought it was unfairly criticized.

Two things are not up for debate: the film is entertaining and the cinematography is gorgeous.

Leonardo DiCaprio's lead character is not particularly likable, but that's nothing new for him. He's good at playing the boyish, cocky immature type. He's also good at narration, which he provides here, as he has in a number of other films. In fact, I wish there were more of it in here.

French actress Virginie Ledoyen is a new face to me, and a pretty one. I found her intriguing, and not just because of her face Actually, all the characters were pretty darn interesting in this film and you get a varied group.

The scenery from Thailand is magnificent. By the way, "the beach" that's in this film really exists, just as it's seen here. The story is interesting, too, for the full two hours. My only complaint was that they might have toned down the language, particularly with all the f-words.

Don't listen to those national critics who blasted this. I think you'll be entertained.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":231488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2000-02-11","keywords":"thailand,paradise,travel,beach,island","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Beach","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3699966233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ0NmY3NjYtZmY0OC00OWI2LThhMDktMjlmZGE4OWZjNjMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ0NmY3NjYtZmY0OC00OWI2LThhMDktMjlmZGE4OWZjNjMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0948679/","name":"Daniel York"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

Leonardo DiCaprio's lead character is not particularly likable, but that's nothing new for him. He's good at playing the boyish, cocky immature type. He's also good at narration, which he provides here, as he has in a number of other films. In fact, I wish there were more of it in here.

programme.title: I pakrahasueshmi
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2010. Një njeriu me një jetë të vështirë, që si pasion ka artet marciale, por detyrohet të bëjë diçka tjetër, i vjen shansi i jetës kur përzgjidhet të marrë pjesë në një turne me luftëtarët më të mirë në botë.
programme.category: Arte marciale
aksion

programme.title: Tomb Raider 2-Djepi i jetes
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie, Gerard Butler, Ciaran Hinds. Aventurierja Lara Croft, me ndihmën e një ish marinsi, përpiqet të gjejë kutinë e Pandorës, përpara se ta gjejë një shkncëtar keqbërës, që kërkon dominimin e botës..
programme.category: Action Superheroes

programme.title: Kasapi
programme.desc: Eric Roberts, Robert Davi. Pas thuajse 20 vitesh në shërbim të një bosi të mafias, një ish boksier me nofkën 'Kasapi' futet në kurth. Por pasi shpëton gjallë, gjithë tërbimi i tij bie mbi fajtorët në një hakmarrje të pamëshirshme.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lindja e dragoit
programme.desc: Philip Ng, Yu Xia. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të dyluftimit midis Bruce Lee dhe murgut shaolin Wong Jack Man, në vitet 1960. Një dyluftim që e ktheu Bruce Lee në një legjendë të arteve marciale.
programme.category: Arte marciale
aksion

programme.title: Ujku
programme.desc: Britani e madhe, 150 e.r. Pasi katër lajmëtarë romakë me mesazh paqeje zhduken në veri të murit të Hadrianit, dhjetë prej ushtarëve më të mirë të Romës ngarkohen të zbulojnë se çfarë u ka ndodhur.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lufta e yjeve IV
programme.desc: Kaloresit Xhedaj qe kane mbetur pa u shfarosur do te luftojne per te rimarre galaktiken e tyre me ne krye princeshen Leia e cila do te kete nje kundershtar shume te forte, gangasterin me te pashpirt te te gjitha galaktikave, Jaba The Hat.
programme.category: Nje shprese e re

programme.title: Xhiroja e fundit
programme.desc: Dennis Hopper, Will Patton, Fred Ward. Pas 30 vjetësh burg, Roni do të rekrutojë nipin e tij për t'u hakmarrë ndaj, policit që e futi pas hekurave. Por një sekret i së kaluarës do të vendosë gjithçka në dilemë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Tron 2: Trashëgimia
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges. Sam, ende vuan zhdukjen e babait, i cili ishte një gjeni në zhvillimin e video lojërave. Por kur Sam, heton nje sinjal të çuditshëm, ai e gjen veten brenda lojës së shpikur nga babai i tij.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Sulm në Bushwik
programme.desc: Dave Bautista, Brittany Snow. Pasi një skuadër ushtarake misterioze merr kontrollin e qytetit, Lusi ndihmohet nga një veteran lufte të kalojë 5 blloqet e lagjes "Bushuik" për të shkuar në destinacionin e saj. nëse është akoma aty.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Në kërkim të së vërtetës
programme.desc: Kur miku i tij i ngushtë vritet ndërsa po hetonte një bandë të dyshimtë, një sherif në pension merr përsipër ta zgjidhë vetë çështjen, por e gjen veten në mes të një rrjeti vdekjeprures korrupsioni.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Zemërdragoi 5: Hakmarrja
programme.desc: 2020. Pasi familja e një fermeri të ri vritet nga keqbërës të pashpirtë, ai bashkohet me një dragua madhështore me frymë të akullt dhe me një mercenar tepër të aftë me shpatën, për të hakmarrë vdekjen e tyre.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Ninxha 2-Hakmarrja
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Kane Kosugi. Pasi gruaja e tij vritet brutalisht, një mjeshtër i arteve marciale, kërkon ndihmën e një shoku të vjetër për të përmirësuar edhe me shumë aftësitë dhe për t'u hakmarrë në mënyrën më të pamëshirshme.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Lindja e diellit
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes, Sean Connery. Gjatë një mbrëmje në zyrat e një korporate Japoneze, një prostitutë gjëndet e vdekur. Një agjent dhe një ekspert i kulturës japoneze do hetojnë mbi vrasjen.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Orët e fundit të Tokës
programme.desc: Robert Knepper, Cameron Crigger. Kur materie nga hapësira përplaset me Tokën, planetit i mbeten vetëm disa orë kohë. Një skuadër shkencëtarësh vihet në kërkim të një sateliti të humbur si mundësia e vetme për shpëtim.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Drejtësi vdekjeprurëse
programme.desc: S.Seagal, M. Ory. Polici Kane dhe skuadra e tij, përballen me një gjeneratë të re kriminelësh, një shoqëri raciste e quajtur 'Shpresa e Re'. Ndërkohë prokurorja e përgjithshme përpiqet të vendosë pas hekurave një përdhunues serial.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Magjistari e Gjarpri i Bardhe
programme.desc: Jet Li. Në një vend ku jetojnë krijesa përtej imagjinatës, një njeri bie në dashuri me një gjarpër 1000 vjeçar, të maskuar si femër. Kur një magjistar zbulon të vërtetën, ai bën të pamundurën për të shpëtuar mbretërinë dhe shpirtin e njeriut.
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Prapa vijës së armikut
programme.desc: 2019. Fundi i Luftës II Botërore. Dy ushtarë të aleancës bllokohen prapa vijës së armikut nazist dhe duhet të gjejnë një menyre për t'u kthyer në shtëpi, pavarësisht tundimit për të pranuar humbjen.
programme.category: Luftë
aksion

programme.title: Në vend të tij
programme.desc: Një burrë me një të kaluar të varfër përfundon duke bërë jetën e një burri tjetër, i cili vjen nga një spektër krejtësisht i kundërt. A mundet një njeri të personifikojë dikë tjetër dhe askush të mos e kuptojë?
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lufta e yjeve V
programme.desc: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher. Luk po mëson nga Joda, për të qënë një kalorës Xhedi dhe Han Solo, ka arritur të fitojë simpatinë e princeshës Leia. Por gjithçka do të vihet në rrezik kur Darth Vader, sulmon koloninë...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Legjenda e vertete
programme.desc: Një ish gjeneral i një dinastie të fuqishme kineze, do të mësojë luftimin e arteve marciale i dehur dhe do të fillojë një mision hakmarrës kundër vëllait të tij, i cili i shkatërroi jetën.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Dashuri para apokalipsit
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Keira Knightley. Ndërkohë që një asteroid i është drejtuar Tokës dhe kanë mbetur pak ditë nga përplasja fatale, një njeri vendos të çlirohet nga çdo peng, ndaj ndërmerr një udhëtim për të takuar ish të dashurën.
programme.category: Dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: I paprekshmi Dru Peterson
programme.desc: Rob Lowe, Kaley Cuoco. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të oficerit të policisë Dru Peterson, i cili pas zhdukjes së gruas së tij të katërt, bëhet i dyshuari kryesor në rastin e saj dhe në vdekjen 'aksidentale' të gruas së tretë...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Heronjte e monumenteve
programme.desc: George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray. Gjatë luftës së dytë botërore, një skuadër ushtarësh të pazakontë merr përsipër te shpëtojë kryeveprat e artit nga hajdutët nazistë dhe t'ua rikthejë ato pronarëve të ligjshëm.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Sfida 2: Fito mbi botën
programme.desc: Tyrone Brown, Mishael Morgan. Kërcimtarët e rrugës më të talentuar nga e gjithë bota, janë mbledhur në Detroit, për te shpallur skuadrën më të mirë. Por atje do të përballen me vështirësi dhe dilema, që do të rrezikojnë ëndrrat e tyre.
programme.category: Muzikë
kërcim

programme.title: Diçka e re
programme.desc: S.Lathan, F.Fantabulous. Kenya McQeen s'mund të ankohet për karrierën e saj, ajo është thuajse në majë të koorporatës. Por në jetën e saj private gjithçka ka mbetur në vend, deri diten kur pranon të takohet me arkitektin lulishtar Brian.
programme.category: Romance

programme.title: Na ishte njëherë në Shangai
programme.desc: Në Shangain e viteve 1920, dy njerëz organizojnë një konkurs bukurie që ndiqet edhe nga elita e shoqërisë. Por kur fituesja është një prej vajzave që nuk pritej, një sërë ngjarjesh tragjike ndryshon fatin e të gjithëve.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në radhët e armikut
programme.desc: Jonas Armstrong, Ben Kingsley, Hannah Tointon. Një i ri, i ndarë nga familja e tij në Luftën e Dytë Botërore, maskohet si Zyrtar Nazist SS dhe zbulon më shumë se vetëm vendndodhjen e familjes së tij...
programme.category: Dramë
Histori

programme.title: Bashkë në çdo hap
programme.desc: Pasi kryejnë një krim për t'i mbijetuar varfërisë, një çift arratiset në vendlindjen e tyre në Kansas, një vend i mbushur me sekrete që i kanë ndjekur ata qëkur u larguan vite më parë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Mirë se vini në Maruen
programme.desc: 2018. Steve Carell, Leslie Mann, Diane Kruger. Historia e vërtetë e Mark Hogancamp-it, një artist që vuan nga stresi posttraumatik, i cili pasi u sulmua dhunshëm fizikisht, krijoi një botë imagjinare për të lehtësuar traumën e tij.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: The Truman show
programme.desc: Jim Carrey, Laura Linney. Po sikur t'ju vëzhgonin çdo moment të jetës tuaj? Jim Carrey është Truman, që zbulon papritur se e gjithë jeta e tij është një shfaqje televizive. Të gjithë mësojnë ç'bën ai në jetën e tij të perditshme.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Të prekësh retë
programme.desc: 2015. Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ben Kingsley. Në vitin 1974, artisti i ecjeve mbi tel Philippe Petit, mbledh një grup njerëzish për ta ndihmuar në realizimin e ëndrrës së tij: të ecë mbi një tel midis dy kullave të Qendrës Tregatre Botërore.
programme.category: Biografi/Dramë

programme.title: Fjala e fundit
programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine, Amanda Seyfried. Harriet, një grua në pension, kërkon të ketë gjithcka nën kontroll, madje ajo do te shkruajë edhe nekrologjinë e saj. Për t'u siguruar që historia e jetës të tregohet sipas saj, ajo punëson një gazetare të re...
programme.category: Drame

programme.title: Frymëzuar nga tradita
programme.desc: Pasi i vjedhin idetë, të dashurin dhe vendin e punës, një stiliste lë Nju Jorkun dhe rikthehet në fermën e familjes, në Rumani. Pikërisht kur mendonte se karriera e saj kishte mbaruar, vendlindja do t'i dhurojë frymëzime të reja...
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Jeta ime pa mua
programme.desc: Nje grua e re i fsheh familjes se saj faktin qe vuan nga kanceri per te jetuar kohen qe i ka mbetur me nje pasion qe s'e kish njohur kurre me pare.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: S'ka ku shkon në këmbë
programme.desc: Joaquin Phoenix, Jonah Hill, Rooney Mara. Jeta e karikaturistit Xhon Kallahan, i cili pas një aksidenti që e la tetraplegjik, zbulon fuqitë shëruese të artit. Vizatimet e tij thumbuese dhe shpesh të diskutueshme, tërhoqën vëmendje ndërkombëtare.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Pas Cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni prapa skenave te xhirimeve te filmit.
programme.category: Bangkok Dangerous

programme.title: Turneu heroik i Billi Linit
programme.desc: Regjisori fitues i çmimit Oskar, Ang Lee. Bazuar në bestsellerin e Ben Fountain. Historia e 19 vjeçarit Billi Li, i cili kthehet në shtëpi pas një beteje të ashpër në Irak. Por përmes vizioneve të tij, tregohet se ç'ndodhi në të vërtetë...
programme.category: Luftë
dramë

programme.title: Konkursi i qenve
programme.desc: Një çift i pazakontë detektivësh: agjenti i FBI-së Frenk dhe rodvaileri Maks, duhet të infiltrohen në spektaklin më ekskluziv të qenve dhe me ndihmën e disa prej kafshëve më të famshme, do të përpiqen të zgjidhin një çështje mjaft të vështirë...
programme.category: Aventurë
komedi

programme.title: Lamtumirë Kristofer Robin
programme.desc: Domhnall Gleeson, Margot Robbie. Një vështrim pas kuintave në jetën e shkrimtarit A.A. Milne dhe krijimit të karakterit aq të dashur, arushi Uini Pu, i frymëzuar nga djali i tij.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Himesh Patel, Lily James, Ed Sheeran. Pas një ngjarjeje misterioze, nje kantautor zgjohet dhe kupton se ai është i vetmi person në Tokë që mban mend grupin 'The Beatles'.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Milionerë me borxhe
programme.desc: Zoey Deutch. Një vajzë e re mendjemprehtë, lindur dhe rritur në Bufalo, Nju jork, vendos të bëhet një mbledhëse borxhesh me shpresën për të shpëtuar nga borxhet e veta dhe nga vendlindja e saj.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Pushtimi: Rrebeshi
programme.desc: Dy vite pasi Alienët kanë pushtuar tokën, njerëzit e mbijetuar në Sidnej, Australi, vazhdojnë luftën e tyre të dëshpëruar. Ndërsa viktimat rriten çdo ditë, rezistenca, së bashku me disa aleatë të papritur, zbulon një komplot që mund ta çojë luftën në një.
programme.category: Aksion
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Snajper 8: Fundi i një vrasësi
programme.desc: Kur snajperi Brandon Becket akuzohet për vrasjen e një personaliteti të huaj, ai i kërkon ndihmë të vetmit person tek i cili ka besim, snajperit legjendar Thomas Beket, i ati i tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Një familje e madhe
programme.desc: Një film nga Gabriele Muccino. Me një kast i mrekullueshëm aktorësh si Stefano Accorsi, Pierfrancesco Favino etj. Të detyruar të qëndrojnë sëbashku për disa ditë, një familje e madhe do të përballet me krisjet, nën sipërfaqen e lumtur .
programme.category: Komedi
drame

programme.title: Harabeli i kuq
programme.desc: Jennifer Lawrence. Dominika detyrohet të ndjekë 'Shkollën e Harabelave', 1 program sekret rus që përgatit rekrutët e rinj si të joshin dhe vrasin. Detyra e saj është që të afrohet me 1 agjent të CIA-s për të zbuluar identitetin e 1 spiuni.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Dashuri dhe ndarje
programme.desc: Gina Rodriguez. Menjëherë pas një ndarjeje të papritur dhe të dhimbshme, një e re ëndërrimtare përgatitet për një fillim të ri sfidues. Por, përpara se të përqafojë jetën e re, atë e pret një aventurë e fundit me mikeshat e saj të vjetra.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Skeçe: Aldo, Giovanni, Giacomo
programme.desc: Treshja e komedianëve me 10 prej skeçeve të tyre më të mirë dhe role si: 3 binjakë të palindur, alpinistë, udhëtues në hapësirë dhe ngarkues kafshësh në varkën e Noes...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Të jesh apo të mos jesh
programme.desc: Mel Brooks, Anne Bancroft. Aktori i një trupe teatrale polake dhe gruaja e tij, ndihmojnë sado pak sipas mënyrës së tyre, kundër pushtimit nazist.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Fantoci në sulm
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio. Edhe pse në pension, Fantoci ende tallet nga ish kolegët. Pikërisht kjo është edhe arsyeja që e shtyn të hidhet në sulm. Por sa i suksesshëm është mbetet për t'u parë...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Të përjashtuarit
programme.desc: Dy gjimnaziste peshkope planifikojnë hakmarrjen e tyre pasi bien viktimë e shakasë poshtëruese të një prej studenteve me popullore të shkollës.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Historia e çmendur e botës
programme.desc: Nga Epoka e Gurit, Perandoria Romake, Inkuizicioni Spanjoll, dhe Revolucioni Francez, filmi i njohur i regjisorit dhe komedianit Mel Brooks, parodizon momente të mëdha historike në botë dhe progresin e njerëzimit.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Kujtimet e një vrasësi të rreme
programme.desc: Kevin James. Pasi botuesi ndryshon zhanrin e një romani mbi jetën e një vrasësi, nga trillim në histori të vërtetë, autori e gjen veten mes rreziqeve të personazhit kryesor, kur të gjithë besojnë se ai është vrasësi i frikshëm.
programme.category: Komedi
aksion

programme.title: Terapia e zemëratës
programme.desc: Sandler luan rolin e nje biznesmeni i cili denohet gabimisht per te ndjekur nje program terapie per menaxhimin e ndjenjave te zemerimit, ku ka te beje me nje instruktor agresiv.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Lajm i mirë
programme.desc: Pasi bëjnë fekondimin invitro, dy çifte pa asgjë të përbashkët veç mbiemrit, tashmë janë në pritje të ëmbël. Por gëzimi i lajmit të mirë zgjat pak kur ata zbulojnë se spermatozoidët e secilit çift, janë ngatërruar me njëri-tjetrin...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mike për vdekje
programme.desc: Claudia Gerini, Cristiana Capotondi, Sabrina Impacciatore. Në një ishull përrallor në jug të Italisë, tri gra të cilat ndajnë një sekret që i ka bërë mike për vdekje, detyrohen të bashkëpunojnë për të shpëtuar nga një hetues i policisë..
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Atëherë kur nuk e pret
programme.desc: Në vitin 1993, në qytetin e Nju Jorkut, dy motra tek të 30-tat, plotësisht të varura nga njëra-tjetra, zbulojnë papritur se nëna që ato mendonin se kishte vdekur kur ishin të vogla, është gjallë dhe luan në një telenovelë mjaft të njohur.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Popstar: Asgjë s'na ndal
programme.desc: Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone. Pasi kupton që albumi i tij i parë që ka publikuar vetëm nuk është aspak i suksesshëm, një ish pjestar i një grupi të njohur muzikor, bën gjithçka për të ruajtur famën.
programme.category: Komedi
muzikë

programme.title: Tension i lartë
programme.desc: Studentet Maria dhe Aleks nuk kanë asnjë ide të tmerrit që i pret, kur vendosin të kalojnë fundjaven duke studiur në shtëpinë e qetë në fshat të prindërve të Aleksias.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: I torturuari
programme.desc: Erika Christensen, Jesse Metcalfe. Një çift, thur një plan të tmerrshëm për të rrëmbyer dhe torturuar njeriun përgjegjës për vrasjen e djalit të tyre..
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Rrethi
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2002. Naomi Watts, në rolin e një gazetareje, e cila duhet të hetojë mbi një kasetë filmike, që sipas një legjende urbane shkakton vdekjen e kujtdo që e sheh, brenda 7 diteve.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Gropa
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2009. Dy vëllezër dhe fqinja e tyre simpatike, zbulojnë një gropë misterioze në bodrumin e shtëpisë dhe shumë shpejt kuptojnë se kjo është porta që lidhet me horroret e botës së përtejme.
programme.category: Thriller
fantazi

programme.title: Barrikada
programme.desc: 2012. Eric McCormack, Jody Thompson. Një njeri shkon bashkë me 2 fëmijët e tij për të pushuar në një kabinë në pyll. Por shumë shpejt pushimet e shumëpritura, kthehen në një luftë të egër për mbijetesë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Koleksionisti i kockave
programme.desc: Nje ekspert kriminalistike (Denzel Washinton) dhe nje detektive (Angelina Jolie) do te vihen ne kerkim te nje vrasesi serial dhe do te zbulojne nje te kaluar te erret.
programme.category: Thriller dramatik

programme.title: Zjarri vrasës
programme.desc: 1991. Kurt Rusell. Dy vëllezër, nga një familje zjarrfikësish, gjithmonë në konflikt me njëri-tjetrin, do të lënë mënjanë mosmarreveshjet për të zgjidhur misterin e një serie zjarrvëniesh të qëllimshme që po terrorizojnë qytetin e Cikagos.
programme.category: Mister

programme.title: Jeta e Devid Geil
programme.desc: Regjia: Alan Parker; Aktorët: Kate Winslet, Kevin Spacey. Një njeri me bindje kundër denimit me vdekje akuzohet se ka vrarë një bashke-aktivist dhe përgatitet te ekzekutohet.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Dënim për fajtorët
programme.desc: Joe Cole, English Frank. Pasi e dashura e tij sulmohet brutalisht nga një grup adoleshentësh, një djalosh që përpiqej të mos hapte telashe, futet në shtëpinë e edukimit ku ata janë dënuar dhe fillon t'i ndëshkojë pa mëshirë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Peng i pretendimit
programme.desc: Kevin Zegers, Ray Liotta. I papunë dhe i dëshpëruar për të fituar sa më shpejt para, një i ri rrëmben 3 fëmijë dhe kërkon 3 milionë dollarë nga prindërit e tyre.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Kujdes kur shpreh dëshirën
programme.desc: Nick Jonas. Një 18-vjeçar ngatërrohet në një lidhje obsesive me një bashkëshorten e re të një burri të pasur. Shumë shpejt lidhja e tij përshkallëzohet në një skandal vdekjeprurës.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Byroja e njerëzimit
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage. Ngrohja globale ka pakësuar burimet amerikane, ndaj qeveria evidenton dhe dëbon personat joproduktivë. Një punonjës rebelohet kur shqyrton rastin e një gruaje dhe djalit të saj të pafajshëm , por me sekretet e tyre...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
Thriller

programme.title: Sex and the City
Seks i grad
programme.desc:
Sex and the City: Created by Darren Star. With Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon. Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0159206/","name":"Sex and the City","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGEyNDRjM2QtY2VlYy00OWRhLWI4N2UtZTM4NDc0MGM0YzBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0159206/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fusskins"},"dateCreated":"2000-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sex and the City bashers be damned!!!","reviewBody":"I am a 23 year old single woman living in Manhattan and I love and relate to this show. All though I am younger and poorer than these women, and I don't get nearly as many men as they do (not to mention the fact that I'm Black!), I think this show has alot of insightful and funny things to say about being a woman in New York.

And to address the sex issue...I am so tired of the Madonna/Whore complex everyone in the country seems to be up to their eyeballs in. Get over it! Women like sex, they have sex, and they have sex with men they don't like. So what? And so what if they continue to look for Mr. Right even when they're with Mr. Right Now. What person man or woman hasn't consistently done something, seemingly at cross-purposes with their intended goal in the name of love, lust, or companionship? Stop with the tired double standards (that includes HBO's ban on full frontal male nudity on the show!)

Let's address the real issue: We all wish we were getting it as much as Samantha--even it's from just ONE person!!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":115387,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-06-06","keywords":"friendship between women,friendship,love life,casual sex,new york city","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000326/","name":"Kim Cattrall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004862/","name":"Kristin Davis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020963/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050436/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0823015/","name":"Darren Star"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sex and the City: The Sixth Season - Part 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi394723609","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI0MjIzN2YtMTlhYS00ZjM0LThkZTAtZTU4ZDdlODEzZjViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI0MjIzN2YtMTlhYS00ZjM0LThkZTAtZTU4ZDdlODEzZjViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nightlife
Noćni život
programme.desc: Nightlife: Directed by Simon Verhoeven. With Elyas M'Barek, Julian Looman, Frederick Lau, Nicholas Ofczarek. Nebesa
programme.desc: Up: Directed by Pete Docter, Bob Peterson. With Ed Asner, Christopher Plummer, Jordan Nagai, Bob Peterson. 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1049413/","name":"Up","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3NDE2NzI4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzE1MzEyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1049413/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best animated movies ever made","reviewBody":"This film is possibly one of the best animated films of all time as it tells an emotional moving story while being funny. As I said the emotion in this film is full of heart and even though I didn't cry it will make most people cry. The characters in this are perfect even if it is a small character like Ellie or big character like Carl everybody gets so much development even Charles Muntz the villain of the film is also given development, even more than some superhero films nowadays. Also this film has comedy some Pixar films now just want to make you cry but in the 2000s they had mix of sad and funny moments. So overall this film is as close to perfect as an animated film can get, it is has a mix of emotions it is funny and sad when it needs to be it has so much heart and the characters are perfect. This film in my opinion is the best Pixar film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":984844,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-06-03","keywords":"heartfelt,balloon,talking dog,child in jeopardy,south america","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UP Â– UK Trailer ","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2557280793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NTQ0MTM3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY1NDgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NTQ0MTM3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY1NDgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"UP Â– UK Trailer "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000799/","name":"Ed Asner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2973712/","name":"Jordan Nagai"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001652/","name":"John Ratzenberger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677037/","name":"Bob Peterson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677037/","name":"Bob Peterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565336/","name":"Tom McCarthy"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Aladdin
Aladin
programme.desc:
Aladdin: Directed by Ron Clements, John Musker. With Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin, Jonathan Freeman. A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103639/","name":"Aladdin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q2NDI1MjUtM2Q5ZS00MTFlLWJiYWEtNTZmNjQ3OGJkZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103639/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ElMaruecan82"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forever a favorite of mine ...","reviewBody":"I will never forget the first time I watched "Aladdin", I was with a group of friends waiting in the airport for the plane that would take us from Orlando to Paris at the time when "Aladdin" was the 'big thing' in the USA while some previews of "The Lion King" were starting to screen. "Aladdin" will forever be associated to that wonderful week I spent in Disneyland, and it's only fitting if the movie is my favorite Disney film, slightly edging-out "The Jungle Book".

I know I can get all rational in this review, analyzing what makes "Aladdin" such an appealing film and using the expected words of 'Disney Renaissance' and a comparison with the glorious Best Picture nominee predecessor. I can also talk about the animation, the music, the extraordinary multi-vocal performance of Robin Williams as Genie but I don't feel like getting rational. I love the film for personal reasons that are essentially due to the excellent timing of this film in its penetration of my pre-adolescent life. "Aladdin" took a forever cherished place as one of the last treasures that enriched my childhood even playing a pivotal role in the way I would start enjoying cartoons.

"Kid's day in the USA!" was the motto of the week that was celebrating the 65th birthday of Mickey Mouse, and for a kid who never traveled outside his country, going to Disneyland was the most unexpected destination, the most extraordinary trip I would never have dared to dream of. This is when I discovered "Aladdin", through the 'Prince Ali' fanfare endlessly performed during the parades, through the films' images aired on TV; something was strangely attracting me to the film. And I guess the fact that I knew the story helped a lot: I grew up with a French cartoon from 1969, titled 'Aladin and the Magic Lamp' recorded in an 80's videocassette, a movie I can recite (and sing) by heart, and there was also an obscure Manga 'Aladdin' film we watched at school before the summer holidays.

Needless to say I was already familiar with the story, and seeing it translated into Disney language was something I was excited to see. Would they talk about Aladdin's deceased father Mustapha? Would he live with his mother? What kind of roles would Genie play? Well one thing matters apart from these questions: I knew the story and I could understand the film even if I didn't speak English at that time it wouldn't have helped me anyway because the airport was very noisy, so I just sat on my luggage, eating some candies, and I could understand who was who and what was everyone's scheme: obviously, Aladdin wanted to be a prince to marry the princess and Jafar to marry the princess to become the prince, and between them, the Genie would come to fulfill their dreams. So, I saw the film and I loved it.

And for one year, before I would see it again, the music of 'Pince Ali' and 'A Whole New World' was the musical remembrance of that magical week in Disney World. And when I saw it again, it took another dimension: I finally understood the subtleties of the stories, I learned all the songs after repetitive viewings, and for months and months, I was transported by the 'Prince Ali' parade and its climactic conclusion and the romantic 'A Whole New World' and its beautiful opening, when Jasmine jumps on the carpet and the zoomed-out Rajah looks smaller and smaller, watching from the balcony. I saw the film so many times during my pre-teen years that I would never forget the first sensations it immersed me into, with an unexpected awkward one.

I must confess that Jasmine was one of my first movie crushes and my idea of the ideal woman as a kid, I don't know why but the way she looked during the 'love at first sight moment' hypnotized me and the moment where I always melt occurs in the carpet ride, when Aladdin gives her the apple, when you understand that she understood who the Prince Ali is, there are no words to describe how incredibly sexy she looks at that very moment. The crush didn't last of course, and as I grew older and was disappointed with the 'Return of Jafar' sequel and the TV series, my interest for "Aladdin" declined and it was reduced to 'kid's stuff I used to like'.

And then 10 years later, as a student, I saw the film again on my computer, eating a pizza, and something magical happened when the 'Whole New World' music started during the closing credits, my heart was inundated by a nostalgic torrent, so immense that I couldn't stop crying because it reminded me of the privileged place the movie occupied once in my heart. The magic was back, and whenever I was spending a good time with friends, we were having fun listening to these old Disney songs, and the clip of 'A Whole New World' was a must-see and how glad I was to discover that I wasn't the only one who 'liked' Jasmine.

I feel so concerned by this film and so deeply attached to it, that I don't want to spoil this review with critical or ecstatic reviews, the film is just thrilling, romantic, adventurous, and features certainly the greatest cast of supporting characters without it being the counterpart of a dull hero or heroine, there's not a single minute of the film that seems pointless and wasted and certainly not with a character like Genie. That's the best I could do to rationally 'explain' my love for "Aladdin".

But maybe because loving a film can also depend on external factors that influence your judgment, in the case of "Aladdin", everything contributed to make this my favorite Disney film ... for sentimental reasons yes, but who ever said they were wrong?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389662,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1992-11-25","keywords":"genie,three wishes,genie character,arab,princess","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi677035801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyMjRhYjUtOGM1My00OTQzLWEzZTAtOThjM2Q3OTMyNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyMjRhYjUtOGM1My00OTQzLWEzZTAtOThjM2Q3OTMyNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0918334/","name":"Scott Weinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488306/","name":"Linda Larkin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166256/","name":"Ron Clements"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615780/","name":"John Musker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133018/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166256/","name":"Ron Clements"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615780/","name":"John Musker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="
