With Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett, Tiffany Haddish. It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3513498/","name":"The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyOTkwNDc1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzkyMzk3NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3513498/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dmshrmed","dateCreated":"2019-06-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something is wrong","reviewBody":"I'm having trouble figuring out exactly what it is, but this film is severely lacking in something the first one mastered. Let's start with the easy stuff. There are way too many references and bad puns. Some reviewers would call these references "jokes the adults can understand", and while that is true, they aren't funny. They're just kind of there. They are references that exist for you to say "I get that". There is no "ha" preceding that. Yes, the original also had references and bad puns, but they were used well and there weren't nearly as many. The first LEGO movie was very self aware, but it had a soul that really seemed to care about what it was saying. The second LEGO movie was so self aware that it was very difficult to take seriously. There was an obvious message about how growing up should be about learning to work with different people, but it kind of fell flat beneath the veil of "play with others even if you don't like how they play". It honestly made me a little angry. Maybe it wasn't intentional, but the film seemed to suggest that traditionally masculine things are incapable of being imaginative. I couldn't help but feel a pinch of modern social politics biting for my throat. The first film felt very apolitical, and I believe that's fitting for a film about a franchise of toys that cradled our imaginations before we cared about politics. This film certainly didn't "ruin my childhood" by any means, but it was a disappointment.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60966,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-02-07","keywords":"lego,sequel,queen,spaceship,vampire","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2788407833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE3ZmYwNTgtNTBmOC00NGU1LWJjNzktOTVhMjEzODFmOGFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXdhZHppdGE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE3ZmYwNTgtNTBmOC00NGU1LWJjNzktOTVhMjEzODFmOGFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXdhZHppdGE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild. The battle to defeat them and restore harmony to the LEGO universe will take Emmet, Lucy, Batman and their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds, including a strange galaxy where everything is a musical. It will test their courage, creativity and Master Building skills, and reveal just how special they really are.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006969/","name":"Elizabeth Banks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468593/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602537/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0520488/","name":"Phil Lord","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588087/","name":"Christopher Miller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821363/","name":"Matthew Fogel"],"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
Oceanovih jedanaest
programme.desc:
Ocean's Eleven: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With George Clooney, Cecelia Ann Birt, Paul L. Nolan, Carol Florence. Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0240772/","name":"Ocean's Eleven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzVmYzVkMmUtOGRhMi00MTNmLThlMmUtZTljYjlkMjNkMjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0240772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Buddy-51"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"a pleasant souffle of a film","reviewBody":"Steven Soderbergh's remake of `Ocean's Eleven' is a stylish heist picture featuring some of the brightest stars in moviemaking today. The cast includes George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, and Matt Damon from the A-list, as well as such established veterans as Andy Garcia, Elliot Gould and Carl Reiner in there playing along with them. Coming right off the heels of two highly acclaimed, award-laden serious dramas (`Traffic' and `Erin Brockovich'), it's understandable that Soderbergh might have been in the mood for something a little lighter in tone right about now. Well, he has certainly found it with this property, which sails along smoothly like a well-oiled machine, with no angst-filled messages or heavy-handed themes to gum up the works. 

Taking the basic premise from the original 1960 film (which featured a who's-who of Hollywood stars of its own day), Soderbergh has updated it to reflect the advanced technological realities of the 21st Century. In this film, recently paroled Daniel Ocean (Clooney) has decided to mastermind the robbing of not one but three major Las Vegas casinos all owned by the nefarious Terry Benedict (Garcia). The rub is that Benedict has also recently added Ocean's ex-wife, Tess (Roberts), to his list of assets, which gives Ocean additional incentive to take Benedict for everything he's got. One of the amazing things is that the filmmakers use an actual casino as their target (the Bellagio) rather than devising a fictional one for their story's purpose. One might think it could give certain audience members the wrong ideas. Be that as it may, the director does a fine job exploiting the Vegas setting, taking us right into the heart of casino operations.

A film like `Ocean's Eleven' stands or falls on the charisma of its stars, the intricacy of its plotting and the plausibility of its actions. Luckily for the audience, the film pretty much succeeds on all three counts. Scenarist Ted Griffin does a fine job gathering together the men who will participate in the heist, allowing each a moment or two to define his character and to become part of the team. The details of the plan itself are explained in very clear terms so that we rarely feel as if we are not able to follow the action. There is even an inspired use of `Clair de Lune' near the end of the picture to lend an air of romanticism to the accomplishment, for who would deny that such large-scale thievery has often carried with it a certain element of idealism and romance? After all, look how many books and films have featured robbers as heroes. It perhaps explains why Tess can go from being a principled, law-abiding citizen at the beginning of the film to being an accomplice in crime at the end, all for the love of a man  and we cheer her for it. 

Unlike in Soderbergh's other films, we do not find hidden depths lurking beneath the shining handsome surface of this movie, and we certainly carry no nutritious food for thought away with us from this film as we did from the others. In fact, `Ocean's Eleven' is all ABOUT shining handsome surface and it makes no pretension of being about anything else. It's cinematic junk food of the highest order, but, then, since when has junk food not been satisfying?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":543449,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-20","keywords":"casino,heist,criminal mastermind,card dealer,ulcer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ocean's Eleven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822294297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFmYzc5YTUtOTczNC00YjJhLWJiZWMtYWNhMTBiOWY2Njc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFmYzc5YTUtOTczNC00YjJhLWJiZWMtYWNhMTBiOWY2Njc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024939/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425138/","name":"George Clayton Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751207/","name":"Jack Golden Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113689/","name":"Harry Brown"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Normalni ljudi
programme.desc: Marianne je godinu dana na studentskoj razmjeni u Švedskoj. Raskid s Jamiejem stajao ju je nekih prijatelja, ali i dalje je u kontaktu s Connellom i Joannom. Marianne je godinu dana na studentskoj razmjeni u Švedskoj. Raskid s Jamiejem stajao ju je nekih prijatelja, ali i dalje je u kontaktu s Connellom i Joannom. U vezi je s Lukasom, fotografom kojeg upoznaje na fakultetskoj zabavi. Vrativši se u Dublin, Connell uživa u svojoj vezi s Helenom i nastavlja studij na Trinityju.

programme.title: Normalni ljudi
programme.desc: Connell i Helen vani dočekuju novu godinu u Dublinu. Kasno te noći Connell dobiva grupnu poruku u kojoj ga pitaju gdje je Rob. Sljedeće jutro stiže vijest da je Rob umro. Connell i Helen vani dočekuju novu godinu u Dublinu. Kasno te noći Connell dobiva grupnu poruku u kojoj ga pitaju gdje je Rob. Sljedeće jutro stiže vijest da je Rob umro. Connell se bori s emocionalnim posljedicama Robove smrti. Marianne ga pokušava razuvjeriti putem Skypea. Kroz savjetovanje i Marianneino prijateljstvo Connell počinje vidjeti izlaz.

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Radovi u tijeku
programme.desc: Temeljena na njezinu životu, druga sezona serije RADOVI U TIJEKU nastavlja se s McEnanynim likom Abby nakon njezina prekida (i nakon što je gotovo ostala bez badema). Temeljena na njezinu životu, druga sezona serije RADOVI U TIJEKU nastavlja se s McEnanynim likom Abby nakon njezina prekida (i nakon što je gotovo ostala bez badema). 46-godišnja samoprozvana, debela, queer dajkica Abby nezadovoljno prihvaća da je previše zauzeta da bi se ubila. Zapravo, ona se taman počinje izvlačiti iz problema... kad se globalna pandemija spoji s obiteljskom krizom i natjera je na neistraženi teritorij. U glavnoj je ulozi Abby McEnany.

programme.title: Seks i grad
programme.desc: Carrie Bradshaw piše kolumnu o seksu i vezama u New York Cityju. Carrie Bradshaw piše kolumnu o seksu i vezama u New York Cityju. Uz nju su njezine tri najbliže prijateljice: Samantha Jones, koja ima vlastitu agenciju za odnose s javnošću te je više zanima uzbudljiv seks za jednu noć nego dugoročne veze, Miranda Hobbes, cinična odvjetnica kojoj je karijera važnija od njezinog nepostojanog ljubavnog života i Charlotte York, kustosica u umjetničkoj galeriji koja je pomalo pretjerano kreposna kada je riječ o seksu, ali još uvijek nije izgubila nadu da će naći pravu ljubav. Nastala prema bestseleru Candace Bushnell, serija "Seks i grad" prati živote četiriju mladih stručnih žena koje su u potrazi za savršenom vezom i… orgazmom!

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
Vuk iz Snow Hollowa
programme.desc: The Wolf of Snow Hollow: Directed by Jim Cummings. With Jim Cummings, Riki Lindhome, Robert Forster, Chloe East. Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werewolves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11140488/","name":"The Wolf of Snow Hollow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWZlMDBiMmItMWU0Ny00MGIzLWI1NTQtZDEwMjM0MzBiYjhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIxMjMyODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werew","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11140488/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ofumalow"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun, but still a letdown","reviewBody":""Thunder Road" was such an unexpected delight that I'm willing to go easy on Cummings for having something of a sophomore slump. This shows all signs of being rushed to capitalize on that modest success, as it basically just reprises the same character with some (but not enough) variations in a more genre-oriented story. The problem is that "Road" was entirely built around his over-the-top character, which was excessive in (almost always) good ways, whereas this time that character's tantrums, childishness, et al. Are less funny, and eat up screentime that would have been better spent fleshing out the horror aspects that instead go underdeveloped. So even as a comedy horror (though the horror isn't exactly comic, and there's no real satire here), the film is imbalanced by too much attention given to a star role that's too close to Cummings' prior one, and which isn't at all usefully integrated into the genre-focused plot. Still, he has some filmmaking chops and an interesting sensibility that keep this entertaining, though hopefully his next feature will be better thought out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16299,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-10-09","keywords":"mountain,snow,investigation,murder,serial killer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3433414937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJlMmMyMDktOTllMC00MzljLWJhNTAtNzQxZmE1ZjdkYzczXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJlMmMyMDktOTllMC00MzljLWJhNTAtNzQxZmE1ZjdkYzczXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Welcome to Snow Hollow. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werewolves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11140488/","name":"The Wolf of Snow Hollow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWZlMDBiMmItMWU0Ny00MGIzLWI1NTQtZDEwMjM0MzBiYjhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIxMjMyODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werew","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11140488/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ofumalow","dateCreated":"2021-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun, but still a letdown","reviewBody":""Thunder Road" was such an unexpected delight that I'm willing to go easy on Cummings for having something of a sophomore slump. This shows all signs of being rushed to capitalize on that modest success, as it basically just reprises the same character with some (but not enough) variations in a more genre-oriented story. The problem is that "Road" was entirely built around his over-the-top character, which was excessive in (almost always) good ways, whereas this time that character's tantrums, childishness, et al. Are less funny, and eat up screentime that would have been better spent fleshing out the horror aspects that instead go underdeveloped. So even as a comedy horror (though the horror isn't exactly comic, and there's no real satire here), the film is imbalanced by too much attention given to a star role that's too close to Cummings' prior one, and which isn't at all usefully integrated into the genre-focused plot. Still, he has some filmmaking chops and an interesting sensibility that keep this entertaining, though hopefully his next feature will be better thought out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16299,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-10-09","keywords":"mountain,snow,investigation,murder,serial killer","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3433414937","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJlMmMyMDktOTllMC00MzljLWJhNTAtNzQxZmE1ZjdkYzczXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJlMmMyMDktOTllMC00MzljLWJhNTAtNzQxZmE1ZjdkYzczXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Welcome to Snow Hollow. Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8629136/","name":"Spides","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcyZjZiMjItMmZmNS00NTEwLTg4NmItOWQyZGNmMThmOTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMDk5OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8629136/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tmf-3"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Matter of taste","reviewBody":"I think it is always a matter of taste. Spides is different. I like the story. I like the style. I like the settings. The story isn't crazy new, but its a well made serie. Rosabell Laurenti makes a great job, which keeps me to watch on. For me it works out.
